results.description: Consecration. Create a ring of fire. With each pulse, burn foes while removing conditions from allies inside the area of effect.

facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

Reinigende Flammen
Flammes purificatrices
Llamas purgadoras

traited_facts.description: Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

results.description:
Mantra. Recite a hymn from the annals of Turai to quicken yourself and your allies.
The final charge of this skill is more powerful.

results.description: Set yourself alight, periodically burning up to three nearby foes. The final pulse applies additional burning.

facts.description: Burn nearby foes.
Deals damage every second; stacks intensity.

name: Zealot's Flame

results.description: Shout. Grant fury and quickness to nearby allies. The duration of the quickness you grant yourself is doubled.

facts.description: Skills and actions are faster.
Critical chance increased; stacks duration.

name: "Feel My Wrath!"
"Subissez mon courroux !"
"Spürt meinen Zorn!"
"¡Siente mi ira!".
